DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to measure the INR (International Normalized Ratio) time percentage in the target zone (TTR: time in therapeutic range) of children benefiting from the AVK therapeutic education program.
DOC.criteria: age from 0 to 18 years AVK prescription to accept participating to AVK therapeutic education program informed consent form of parents or legal person parents or legal person refusal to enter in the AVK therapeutic education
